name: Photo Darts HD Lite
description:
Stressed in Life? Dart your Wife!

Photo Darts HD lets you throw darts at anyone! Simply load a photo onto the dart board and start throwing!

You can dart just about anything, dart your boss, dart your ex, dart your dog, dart yourself, dart your bills, dart your car.

If you can take a photo of it, you can dart it!

Includes beautifully rendered retina iPad graphics, realistic game play, and a ton of options to share your darted photo with everyone!

Features:
- iPad Retina Display Graphics
- Take photo with Camera or Load from Library
- Save to Library, Facebook, Print, or Email
- Realistic Swipe-to-Throw Game Play
- Realistic Sound FX
